origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicsAPI.analyze_exchange_rate_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of regulatory policies on the exchange rate of a specified currency.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'currency', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The currency code, e.g., CNY for Chinese Yuan.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the analysis is conducted.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_report', 'description': 'The detailed analysis report on the impact of policies on the exchange rate.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicsAPI.analyze_exchange_rate_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'currency'是'CNY', 'year'是'2024'.
